features: Dark gray and white marble finish

visual_attributes.lighting: Natural light from windows and ambient light from ceiling

traditional_elements: Decorative details on the fan and cabinet handles
modern_adaptations: Integration of modern materials and design with traditional details
indian_context.space_utilization: Efficient use of space for storage and presentation
indian_context.cultural_significance: The use of marble and dark colors reflects traditional Indian interior design trends

analysis.description: This image showcases a modern Indian bedroom with contemporary design elements. The fitted wardrobe features a dark gray and white marble finish, while built-in shelves provide additional storage solutions with a sleek, glossy design. The room is illuminated by natural light from the windows and a ceiling fan with a gold and silver design, adding a touch of traditional Indian aesthetics. The color palette includes dark gray, white marble, brown wood, and white walls, reflecting a blend of modern and traditional Indian interior design principles.

metadata.budget_indicator: Moderate, with the use of dark gray wood and marble
metadata.functionality: Primary purpose is storage and organization, with a secondary focus on aesthetics and comfort
metadata.indian_specific: Dark gray and white marble finish, cyclone fan with traditional design elements
